oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Search for optimal basis for signal denoising in the space of N-tap wavelets
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: DAS, A
DESAI, UB
VAIDYA, PP
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fir filters
channel bank filters
filtering theory
noise
signal processing
simulated annealing
wavelet transforms
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An algorithm for the construction of optimal compactly supported N-tap orthonormal wavelet for signal denoising is presented. A square norm cost function employing a universal soft-threshold in the wavelet domain is minimized with respect to the parameterized wavelet FIR filter bank coefficients by using the principle of simulated annealing. A few simulation results presented for signal denoising.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Proceedings of the Sixth International Symposium on Signal Processing and its Applications (V 1), Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, 13-16 August 2001, 96-99
